text: *Update*: we discovered an issue and will hold off on launching today. I'll post an update here when we have a new date set!
Would it be bad to start a rumor thread of what guesses we have for updates coming at inbound? I was looking on reddit, and a few other places and havent found anything!

I wonder if SMS is coming to the sales calling feature. Mostly wondering, because we might be signing up with Aircall in the next couple of days, and I would hate to be in a year contract a couple weeks before an announcement!

Yes, definitely, this is awesome, I’ve been waiting for this forever. But still no rows? That’s the most painful part about working with the page editor to me. :disappointed: Being able to drag and drop items in the Contents tab to rearrange them would nice to have as well.
Ah, it does show rows, it’s just HubSpot’s usual bugginess with rows, it seems. Like, I want to put these items in a row, but am unable:
rows have always been very difficult to create :confused:

Wanted to highlight the two public BETAs we have for HubDB going on right now:

1. Drag and drop, manual reordering of rows in HubDB tables
2. Preview draft HubDB rows as dynamic pages
If you want to join these BETAs, you can opt into them by visiting the <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/whats-new/betas?_ga=2.22124083.909685832.1661355197-444887482.1661355197|Product Updates > Early Access > Betas> section within your account settings, or reaching out to me!
Very sexy. Now just add that tablet button to the page editor. :drooling_face:
